meanings: explanation, account, explain, give an explanation (of), (이유를) account for, give an account (of)

vlive.korean: 이거 작품 설명만 잘하면... If I just explain this product well... 듣기 View video ASTRO : 따나의 얼렁뚱땅 초코츄러스 만들기🐥🍫
vlive.english: If I just explain this product well...

vlive.korean: 아니, 아니에요 이유를 같이 설명해주시면... No, no. Just want to know why... 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
vlive.english: No, no. Just want to know why...

vlive.korean: 이제부터 메뉴 설명 들어가도록... Now, I will tell you what menu I'm having now. 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: Now, I will tell you what menu I'm having now.

vlive.korean: [설명 중인 앨범] 왕 의자에 앉아있는 그 앨범... [Explaining about the album] The album with someone is sitting on a big chair. 듣기 View video GOT7 : GOT7(갓세븐) OFFLINE #2
vlive.english: [Explaining about the album] The album with someone is sitting on a big chair.

vlive.korean: 저희 '데자부' 곡 설명 시연 씨가 우리 썸니아들과 모든 분들에게 한번 해드릴까요? Then how about Siyeon introduce "Dejavu" to our InSomnias? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Then how about Siyeon introduce "Dejavu" to our InSomnias?

examples.korean: My explanation was cut off by loud protests. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내 설명은 큰 항의 소리에 중단되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: My explanation was cut off by loud protests. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a pictorial account/record of the expedition 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 탐험에 대한, 그림을 이용한 설명/기록 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: a pictorial account/record of the expedition Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The changes are explained in detail overleaf. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 변경 사항은 뒷면에 상세히 설명되어 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The changes are explained in detail overleaf. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She left the room abruptly without explanation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 아무 이유[설명] 없이 갑자기 방을 나갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She left the room abruptly without explanation. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Their objectives and methods require further elucidation. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들의 목적과 방법은 더 많은 설명이 필요하다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Their objectives and methods require further elucidation. Add to Wordbook
